name: 15% WHT (Service)
description: WHT imposed on income received by a physical person for service performance

name: 15% WHT (Royalties)
description: WHT applied to royalty payments for intangible properties and interest in minerals made to a resident taxpayer.

name: 15% WHT (Interest except local banks and institutions)
description: WHT applied to Interest paid to a physical person or resident taxpayers other than local banks and saving institutions

name: 10% WHT (Rental -Legal Person)
description: WHT levied on income from the rental of movable property and immovable property -legal person

name: 10% WHT (Rental -Physical Person)
description: WHT levied on income from the rental of movable property and immovable property -physical person

name: 6% WHT (Interest for fixed deposit)
description: WHT levied on interest paid by local banks or savings institutions to a resident taxpayer or a physical person having a fixed term deposit

name: 4% WHT (Interest for savings deposit)
description: WHT levied on interest paid by local banks or savings institutions to a resident taxpayer or a physical person having a fixed term deposit

name: 14% WHT (Non-residents -Payment of Interest)
description: WHT imposed on income by non-residents -Payment of interest

name: 14% WHT (Non-residents -Payment of royalty/rental/leasing)
description: WHT imposed on income by non-residents -Payment of royalty, rental/leasing, and income related to the use of property

name: 14% WHT (Non-residents -Payment of management fee and technical services)
description: WHT imposed on income by non-residents -Payment of management fee and technical services

name: 14% WHT (Non-residents -Payment of dividend)
description: WHT imposed on income by non-residents -Payment of dividend

name: 14% WHT (Non-residents -Service)
description: WHT imposed on income by non-residents -Service

name: 10% WHT (DTA)
description: Tax imposed on Double Tax Agreements

name: 10% Local Sales VAT -Taxable person
description: VAT rate applied to the standard taxable goods in Cambodia to taxable person

name: 10% Local Sales VAT -Non-taxable person
description: VAT rate applied to the standard taxable goods in Cambodia to non-taxable person

name: 0% Export
description: VAT rate applied to exported goods

name: 0% Tax Exempt -Taxable person
description: Tax exempt goods on taxable person

name: 0% Tax Exempt -Non-taxable person
description: Tax exempt goods on non-taxable person

name: 10% Local Purchase VAT
description: VAT rate applied to the standard taxable supplies in Cambodia

name: 10% VAT on Import
description: VAT rate applied to the standard taxable supplies in Cambodia importation of goods into Cambodia

name: 0% Purchase Exclusive of VAT -Taxable Person
description: VAT exclusive goods on taxable person

name: 0% Purchase Exclusive of VAT -Non-Taxable Person
description: VAT exclusive goods on non-taxable person

name: 0% Non Creditable Purchase -Taxable Person
description: VAT purchase non creditable on taxable person

name: 0% Non Creditable Purchase -Non-Taxable Person
description: VAT purchase non creditable on non-taxable person

name: 10% Sales VAT Exempt (State Charge) -Taxable Person
description: VAT rate applied to sales of goods and service charges to taxable person that is state-borne

name: 10% Sales VAT Exempt (State Charge) -Non-Taxable Person
description: VAT rate applied to sales of goods and service charges to non-taxable person that is state-borne

name: 10% VAT on Import (State Charge)
description: VAT rate applied to the supply of goods and services for imported state-borne

name: 10% Purchase VAT (State Charge)
description: VAT rate applied to purchase of goods and service charges that is state-borne state-borne

name: 20% Corporate Income Tax (Medium & Large Tax Payers)
description: Corporate income tax is the tax imposed on income that a company made. Corporate income tax rates differ based on company size and residency.

name: 0% Corporate Income Tax (Small Tax Payers)
description: Corporate income tax is the tax imposed on income that a company made. Corporate income tax rates differ based on company size and residency.

name: 5% Corporate Income Tax (Small Tax Payers)
description: Corporate income tax is the tax imposed on income that a company made. Corporate income tax rates differ based on company size and residency.

name: 10% Corporate Income Tax (Small Tax Payers)
description: Corporate income tax is the tax imposed on income that a company made. Corporate income tax rates differ based on company size and residency.

name: 15% Corporate Income Tax (Small Tax Payers)
description: Corporate income tax is the tax imposed on income that a company made. Corporate income tax rates differ based on company size and residency.

name: 0% Salary Tax
description: Below 1,500,000 KHR

name: 20% Salary Tax
description: Over 12,500,000 KHR

name: 30% TOI (Oil, Gas and Natural Resource)
description: Enterprises oil or natural gas production or exploitation of natural resources, including timber, ore, gold and previous stones (30%)

name: 5% TOI (Gross Premium Realised by General Insurance, Reinsurance and Micro-insurance enterprises)
description: The gross premium realised by general insurance, reinsurance, and micro-insurance enterprises (5%*)

name: 0% TOI QIPs during Tax Holiday Period
description: QIPs during tax holiday period (0%)

name: 20% Tax on Fringe Benefit
description: Fringe benefits (either in cash or kind) provided directly or indirectly by an employer to employees are subjected to TOFB at 20% on the market value.

name: 20% Capital Gains Tax
description: Capital gains tax on sale or transfer of immovable property, leases, investment assets, goodwill, intellectual property (IP), and foreign currencies.

name: 2% Accommodation Tax
description: Tax imposed on the supply of accommodation services

name: 20% Advance Tax on Dividend Distribution
description: Any dividend distributed from profits before tax to resident or non-resident shareholders is subject to ATDD

name: 0% Advance Tax on Dividend Distribution
description: Any dividend distributed from profits before tax to resident or non-resident shareholders is subject to ATDD

name: 0% Import Duties
description: Import duty is levied on certain goods entering Cambodia

name: 7% Import Duties
description: Import duty is levied on certain goods entering Cambodia

name: 15% Import Duties
description: Import duty is levied on certain goods entering Cambodia

name: 5% Public Lighting Tax -Redistribution
description: Tax imposed on locally produced and imported alcohol and cigarettes. Further redistribution, the PLT base is at 20% of Sale Price

name: 10% Sales Local & International Air Tickets sold in Cambodia, Entertainment Services, Certain locally produced carbonated & similar non-alcoholic drinks
description: Specific tax applied on air tickets sold in Cambodia, entertainment and locally produced carbonated & similar non-alcoholic drinks

name: 3% Sales Telecommunication services
description: Specific tax applied on telecommunications services

name: 20% Sales Locally produced and imported cigarettes and cigars & all kinds of tobacco
description: Specific tax applied on cigars and cigarettes

name: 30% Sales All types of locally produced and imported beer products
description: Specific tax applied on imported and locally produced beer

name: 35% Sales All types of locally produced and imported wine products
description: Specific tax applied on imported and locally produced wine

name: 10% Purchase Local & International Air Tickets sold in Cambodia, Entertainment Services, Certain locally produced carbonated & similar non-alcoholic drinks
description: Specific tax applied on air tickets sold in Cambodia, entertainment and locally produced carbonated & similar non-alcoholic drinks

name: 3% Purchase Telecommunication services
description: Specific tax applied on telecommunications services

name: 20% Purchase Locally produced and imported cigarettes and cigars & all kinds of tobacco
description: Specific tax applied on cigars and cigarettes

name: 30% Purchase All types of locally produced and imported beer products
description: Specific tax applied on imported and locally produced beer

name: 35% Purchase All types of locally produced and imported wine products
description: Specific tax applied on imported and locally produced wine

name: 3% Public Lighting Tax
description: Tax imposed on locally produced and imported alcohol and cigarettes. Further redistribution, the PLT base is at 20% of Sale Price
